meanings.definition: The seed of the flax plant, used for its oil and as a source of fiber.
meanings.sent1: Flaxseeds are tiny seeds that come from the flax plant.
meanings.sent2: I sprinkle flaxseeds on my yogurt for extra nutrients.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flaxseeds refuse to play hide and seek? Because they always get found!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread like flaxseeds in the wind, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The flaxseeds glistened in the sunlight, promising health and vitality.

meanings.definition: A small, brown seed that is rich in omega-3 fatty acids and fiber.
meanings.sent1: Flaxseeds are known for their high omega-3 content.
meanings.sent2: She added flaxseeds to her smoothie for a nutritional boost.
meanings.sent3: The flaxseeds at the party were the life of the snack table!
meanings.sent4: His words were like flaxseeds of wisdom, planting ideas in everyone's minds.
meanings.sent5: The flaxseeds whispered secrets of health and wellness to those who listened.
